There were no other sightings in San Jose on or around April 16th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI am avid photographer and sky watcher who loves to take pictures of airplanes and nature. In California I always noticed the different types of military and commercial planes flying. So as a normal evening i was going out to grill dinner and i glanced in the sky and i saw it. I told my wife , who also witnessed the sighting. This is the third time i have saw sphere objects through out my life. All in different states. Twice in Colorado and one In California. I notices and imediatley new it was unusual. I ruled out the possibilities of it being a balloon because of the altitude....It seemed to be above normal air traffic for the region. The object eventually moved up and diagnol before i lost sight of it behind the trees... before that it was very still ,,stationary. i was excited that i saw it and was able to document the event...because it has happend before and everybody gets a chuckle when i talk about it ..but to me it is no joke it is real.. These are pictures of the object and a picture of an air plane you decide...i do have alot more pictures if interested ...some better than others..
